LABEL: 0x152
STRING: My name is Itarou.

LABEL: 0x18C
STRING: I'm a lonely, single guy living by myself in the city.

LABEL: 0x1D4
STRING: I don't get out much. I make my living working at a factory to support my otaku lifestyle.

LABEL: 0x238
STRING: After finishing up my work, I changed into my casual clothes and relaxed in the break room.

LABEL: 0x2A4
STRING: Ahh, I can't wait to have a smoke after a long day of work.

LABEL: 0x34C
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x35C
STRING: Oh...oh... What am I going to do...umm, well...

LABEL: 0x3C8
STRING: Hm?

LABEL: 0x3FE
STRING: As I was playing with my phone, I heard a mouse-like voice near me.

LABEL: 0x4A5
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4B5
STRING: Ah! He... looked at me... uh, oh, uh...

LABEL: 0x519
STRING: Apparently, the source of the voice is a person who was bumbling around in my peripheral vision earlier.

LABEL: 0x581
STRING: Hmm... who is this woman?

LABEL: 0x606
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x616
STRING: Itarou? Um, can you hear me...?

LABEL: 0x670
STRING: ...Yes, I remember now. She's a coworker of mine.

LABEL: 0x6BA
STRING: I think her name is Moeko.

LABEL: 0x702
STRING: She doesn't talk at all during work, so no one remembers her.

LABEL: 0x760
STRING: Honestly, it'd be more accurate to say she's being intentionally left out... rather than forgotten.

LABEL: 0x80F
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x81F
STRING: ...Oh, so maybe you can't hear me after all...? My voice is too soft...

LABEL: 0x897
STRING: She's still behaving strangely...

LABEL: 0x8D9
STRING: Judging from her behavior, she must have a speaking disorder or something.

LABEL: 0x941
STRING: No wonder my coworkers avoid her.

LABEL: 0x995
STRING: Even though her name is Moeko, the fact she isn't Moe in the slightest is a huge joke.

LABEL: 0xA46
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xA56
STRING: Ah! Um! I'm sorry to interrupt... Itarou!

LABEL: 0xB01
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xB11
STRING: Today, um... Thank you for your work...!

LABEL: 0xB72
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xB82
STRING: I'm very happy to be working in the same position as you for the first time in a long time.

LABEL: 0xC47
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC57
STRING: So what do you... say, do you have any... time soon?

LABEL: 0xCBC
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xCCC
STRING: I mean, I was wondering if you'd like to go together... for dinner or something...

LABEL: 0xDC5
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xDD5
STRING: Hah... yes, right. Right......

LABEL: 0xE37
STRING: Hearing my answer, Moeko looks depressed as her shoulders slump dejectedly.

LABEL: 0xEA3
STRING: Seriously, I'm busy enjoying my otaku lifestyle over here.

LABEL: 0xEEB
STRING: I can't afford to spend my precious time at the end of the day on a 3D woman like this!

LABEL: 0xF94
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xFA4
STRING: I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean to make you... so angry...

LABEL: 0x1021
STRING: Sensing my hostility, she cowers like a frightened animal.

LABEL: 0x10AD
STRING: Ha! What a waste of time.

LABEL: 0x10F3
STRING: I wish she wouldn't talk to me in the first place. She's such a hideous person.

LABEL: 0x1149
STRING: Ignoring the flustered Moeko, I quickly leave the factory.

LABEL: 0x11EF
STRING: Encountering Moeko lowered my spirits, so I go get something tasty to cheer me up on the way home.

LABEL: 0x1267
STRING: After much deliberation, I decided on getting some fast food.

LABEL: 0x12DB
STRING: I can get two hamburgers for... 200 yen. That's pretty cheap.

LABEL: 0x1347
STRING: I guess the reason this junk food tastes so good is because I'm so hungry...

LABEL: 0x13BF
STRING: Ever since I moved out of my parents' house, I retained the poverty I had as a student. Splurging is a bad habit of mine.

LABEL: 0x141B
STRING: Now that I've satisfied my hunger, it's time to check out the Otaku Shop for new merch.

LABEL: 0x1497
STRING: As usual, time after work is spent on otaku activites. It's my routine.

LABEL: 0x14FF
STRING: I'd love to hang out with some otaku friends, but I don't have any.

LABEL: 0x156F
STRING: Well, now that I've handled my business, it's time to go home.

LABEL: 0x15BD
STRING: I went straight for the train station.

LABEL: 0x174E
STRING: Before me was a woman in a lovely outfit who looked like she wandered in from another world.

LABEL: 0x17B0
STRING: Yes! If I had to describe her, I'd say... an angel!

LABEL: 0x1802
STRING: A dainty and lovely beauty!

LABEL: 0x184E
STRING: She is definitely my type. I dare say, I'd even want to marry her on the spot.

LABEL: 0x1905
STRING: What are you doing!? You're staring at me so intently! That's rude!

LABEL: 0x1A28
STRING: ...Hah!? What the...? What did you just... You are talking... about me...?

LABEL: 0x1AF5
STRING: I hope you didn't just say 'Oh, she's so cute!' Right?!

LIST.STRING: I love you! Be my wife!

LABEL: 0x1C2A
STRING: Wha...aaaaaa!? What is this, sudden love confession!?

LABEL: 0x1CDB
STRING: You know what you're talking about? Are you serious?! I mean, what is this all of a sudden!?

LABEL: 0x1DBA
STRING: I don't know how to answer when you just suddenly say something like that...!!

LABEL: 0x1E28
STRING: Oh no. I think I came on too strong.

LABEL: 0x1E74
STRING: This person looks confused, but my love confession is genuine.

LABEL: 0x1EE0
STRING: For now, we decided to introduce ourselves.

LABEL: 0x1F97
STRING: Um... It's nice to meet you...?

LABEL: 0x2048
STRING: I'm Hi...gyah!!! No, my name is...uh, um...

LABEL: 0x20BD
STRING: Moe... Ah! No, it's... Mo-Mo-Mo...

LABEL: 0x215C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x216C
STRING: Moe-Moemori... It's Clara!

LABEL: 0x21F5
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2205
STRING: Feel free to call me Clara! Or Lady Clara, if you'd prefer!

LABEL: 0x22B0
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x22C0
STRING: So, about that... thing you were talking about. I'm glad you... feel that way. But... we can't be friends for starters?

LABEL: 0x2393
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x23A3
STRING: What, ah, no...!? You're such a selfish person! Well, that can't be helped...

LABEL: 0x2460
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: Let's exchange contact information! Then maybe we'll see each other again?

LABEL: 0x252D
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x253D
STRING: Um, can I have some time to think about marriage? I just need some time to think about it.

LABEL: 0x25B0
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x25C0
STRING: I don't know anything about you... and that's something you only do when you get to know each other better, right?

LABEL: 0x26D1
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x26E1
STRING: Wow, thanks a lot, Itarou!

LABEL: 0x2778
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2788
STRING: Huh...... No, that's not...! Now... uh...

LABEL: 0x27E3
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x27F3
STRING: I don't know you! I literally just met you first time in my life!

LABEL: 0x28A2
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x28B2
STRING: I already learned your name from your address! So there's nothing weird about it!

LABEL: 0x2933
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2943
STRING: Look! I could find it easily by going through the list alphabetically! It's so obvious!

LABEL: 0x29BA
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x29CA
STRING: Hmm...! You are so careless to put your personal information with your address!

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2A97
STRING: So, your name is... Itarou. Huh...

LABEL: 0x2B06
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2B16
STRING: That's such a weird name! If I were your mother, I would have named you something cooler!

LABEL: 0x2B89
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2B99
STRING: For example, 'Lady Clara's servant'! I have good taste, don't I?

LABEL: 0x2C4C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2C5C
STRING: Wh-What's with those leering eyes!? Don't look at me like that!

LABEL: 0x2CC5
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2CD5
STRING: Oh, God! Can you please get out of the way? You're such a horrible eyesore!

LABEL: 0x2D9C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2DAC
STRING: Ugh!! We... are done? I have stuff to do!!

LABEL: 0x2E5B
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2E6B
STRING: I'm very busy! I don't have time... for you!

LABEL: 0x2F1C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x2F2C
STRING: Ah... No, I can't stay anymore, sorry! Well... Goodbye!

LABEL: 0x2FD5
STRING: The dainty, beautiful Clara ran away in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x3037
STRING: I was left all alone...

LABEL: 0x30DB
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x30EB
STRING: Hah, hah, hah, hah... Phew... I guess it went okay.

LABEL: 0x3168
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x3178
STRING: Thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump...!!

LABEL: 0x321D
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x322D
STRING: What the hell... was that!? Why is he here...!?

LABEL: 0x32DC
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x32EC
STRING: ...Itarou didn't even notice... He seriously thought I was Clara.

LABEL: 0x3437
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x3447
STRING: I... I-Itarou...

LABEL: 0x362B
STRING: I met someone wonderful today.

LABEL: 0x3671
STRING: Ah, Clara Moemori...!!!

LABEL: 0x36B3
STRING: Just thinking about her makes my heart skip a beat.

LABEL: 0x3713
STRING: I think this is the ideal woman I've been looking for.

LABEL: 0x3777
STRING: The last hope for us otaku... No, the last hope for the 3D realm...!!!

LABEL: 0x37CF
STRING: This is... It must be fate!

LABEL: 0x382D
STRING: I made only one mistake today: I got nervous during the conversation.

LABEL: 0x38A1
STRING: Damn... I couldn't speak at all.

LABEL: 0x38EB
STRING: It's times like these I wish I could communicate better.

LABEL: 0x3955
STRING: Well, we were able to exchange contact information, for what it's worth.

LABEL: 0x39BD
STRING: Clara Moemori... I can't wait to see you again!!

LABEL: 0x3A0D
STRING: With such a happy mood, I crawl under the bed's covers.

LABEL: 0x3A5D
STRING: Ah. I'm so excited to meet her again, I can barely sleep.

LABEL: 0x3CAD
STRING: ...I can't sleep.

LABEL: 0x3CE3
STRING: I wonder why. I've taken my medication.

LABEL: 0x3D2B
STRING: My body feels sluggish. It's a sign my medicine is working.

LABEL: 0x3D7F
STRING: I drank a bit more than usual, but I can't seem to fall asleep.

LABEL: 0x3DE3
STRING: My eyes aren't that heavy. Maybe I'm just too anxious to sleep right now.

LABEL: 0x3E4B
STRING: Forget about getting up and doing something... bad.

LABEL: 0x3EAF
STRING: Forget about sending a message... to someone.

LABEL: 0x3F01
STRING: Because I'm not going to remember a thing in the morning.

LABEL: 0x3F5D
STRING: My heart is still pounding in my chest... my body is on fire.

LABEL: 0x3FAF
STRING: Itarou, who I have a crush on, has confessed to me.

LABEL: 0x3FFD
STRING: I should be happy about this, but...

LABEL: 0x4043
STRING: My heart is racing with anticipation and anxiety. I cannot calm down.

LABEL: 0x40F3
STRING: I'm very... I'm very happy about how this turned out...!!

LABEL: 0x4141
STRING: Happy. Happy, happy, happy...!!

LABEL: 0x418D
STRING: Because it's the very first time... you've actually looked at me.

LABEL: 0x4376
STRING: Ugh... I'm not feeling well.

LABEL: 0x43B8
STRING: I was really excited last night and had a hard time sleeping.

LABEL: 0x4406
STRING: I just couldn't forget about Clara Moemori...

LABEL: 0x445A
STRING: Being cute is a sin... no, it's justice.

LABEL: 0x44AA
STRING: Clara's good morning email has me all excited this morning.

LABEL: 0x4514
STRING: My head was so full of her I couldn't get any work done...

LABEL: 0x4576
STRING: But hey! If it's for Clara, I'm willing to do even the worst tasks!

LABEL: 0x45DA
STRING: Ohhhh!!!!

LABEL: 0x4628
STRING: I finish my work with incredible speed.

LABEL: 0x4672
STRING: I need to take my break soon and check for any emails from Clara!

LABEL: 0x46CE
STRING: ...Aha! So this is must be what love feels like...

LABEL: 0x4726
STRING: Finally, haha...! I really need to haul ass!

LABEL: 0x478E
STRING: Hahahaha...! I couldn't help but smile with joy.

LABEL: 0x47EC
STRING: My coworkers noticed me, and giggled at my behavior, but I don't care.

LABEL: 0x4860
STRING: After getting my work done as quickly as possible, I took my break.

LABEL: 0x4902
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4912
STRING: Um... Itarou! Good morning!

LABEL: 0x4965
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4975
STRING: I see... you're taking a break. Hehe. I just got done too...

LABEL: 0x4A34
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4A44
STRING: Well, uh, yesterday... thank you... very much...

LIST.STRING: Can you not talk to me like we're friends?

LABEL: 0x4B39
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4B49
STRING: Oh...!? Oh, uh, uh... Sorry, I'm sorry...

LABEL: 0x4BF8
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: Yes, right. Itarou is not interested... in me. Hah...

LABEL: 0x4CB7
STRING: I hate that screeching noise.

LABEL: 0x4CEF
STRING: I'm not interested in anyone but the beautiful, angelic girl I met yesterday.

LABEL: 0x4D49
STRING: Even now, I can clearly hear Clara's voice.

LABEL: 0x4DAF
STRING: There is no point spending time with anyone but Clara. That would be a waste.

LABEL: 0x4E1D
STRING: I would never talk to such a plain and ugly woman.

LABEL: 0x4E75
STRING: By the way, I need to check for new emails from Clara as soon as possible!

LABEL: 0x4ED7
STRING: I have to reply quickly, and reaffirm my interest in Clara.

LABEL: 0x4F36
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x4F46
STRING: Good morning, Itarou! Thank you for yesterday! I want to go out with you again♪

LABEL: 0x4FB1
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x4FC1
STRING: You're going to work right now, right? Keep up the good work! I'll do my best while thinking about Itarou, too!

LABEL: 0x504E
STRING: That is the email I got from Clara this morning.

LABEL: 0x5098
STRING: Since I always wake up at the last minute to go to work, this is the earliest time I can check.

LABEL: 0x50FC
STRING: If this is going to continue, I'll have to wake up earlier from now on.

LABEL: 0x515D
STRING: Hmm... What should I send...?

LABEL: 0x51D8
STRING: And the reply is sent.

LABEL: 0x5220
STRING: Within an instant, I got a reply.

LABEL: 0x5264
STRING: Wow, that was fast!

LABEL: 0x529C
STRING: Could it be that Clara is taking a break now, too?

LABEL: 0x52F4
STRING: What a delightful surprise... Maybe we're all tied together by the red thread of fate after all!

LABEL: 0x5361
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5371
STRING: Thank you so much! I'm so happy... I think I like you too, Itarou!

LABEL: 0x53E4
STRING: ...It seems we are both smitten with each other.

LABEL: 0x542C
STRING: I knew that without needing confirmation, but it's still nice to see it.

LABEL: 0x5495
STRING: Oh, Clara... Why are you such an angel...!?

LIST.STRING: Would you like to have dinner with me?
I'll buy you a drink tonight.

LABEL: 0x5534
STRING: The reply is sent.

LABEL: 0x557D
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x558D
STRING: Yes! Let's go ^^ I'll be waiting at the place we met yesterday!

LABEL: 0x55E6
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x55F6
STRING: I've been looking forward to going out with you, Itarou! I have to think about where to go...

LABEL: 0x56C2
STRING: I looked up and saw Moeko sitting across from me, fiddling with her phone.

LABEL: 0x572A
STRING: Is she upset over what I said to her?

LABEL: 0x577E
STRING: I'm not interested in her at all, though I do feel a slight bit guilty.

LABEL: 0x5826
STRING: ...Huh?

LABEL: 0x5856
STRING: Looking closely, I saw her smile a little bit.

LABEL: 0x589A
STRING: Wow. That woman is such a weirdo... I guess I shouldn't feel guilty after all.

LABEL: 0x5924
STRING: Bah. I don't care about her anyway.

LABEL: 0x5972
STRING: Why should I, when I only care about Clara Moemori!?

LABEL: 0x59BA
STRING: Ah, Clara...! Oh, that's right, I can see her again after work...!!!

LABEL: 0x5ADC
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5AEC
STRING: Hmph... Mmm, mmm, mmm...mmm...mmmm! Yummy!

LABEL: 0x5B59
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5B69
STRING: I knew having the rice was a good idea - it's koshihikari rice! Each little bit tastes so sweet!

LABEL: 0x5BEF
STRING: Clara eating rice... She looks very healthy.

LABEL: 0x5C45
STRING: But how could a woman who eats so voraciously be so cute...

LABEL: 0x5CBD
STRING: No! She's cute because she's Clara! There can be no doubt!

LABEL: 0x5D58
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5D68
STRING: Whoa, what's wrong, Itarou...? You've been staring at my face for some time now.

LABEL: 0x5E1F
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5E2F
STRING: Oh my... Could it be... I have some rice grains on my face? Oh, that's so embarrassing...

LABEL: 0x5F3A
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5F4A
STRING: Hey! Hey, hey! Shush, you! Come on, Itarou, you must be making fun of me, aren't you?

LABEL: 0x5FCB
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x5FDB
STRING: I'm pure, so don't say things you don't mean! No flattery, no fawning!

LABEL: 0x609A
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x60AA
STRING: If, if! You're telling the truth... Oh, I might be so happy I'll die!

LABEL: 0x6167
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x6177
STRING: I can believe... in Itarou's feelings... about us...?

LABEL: 0x61EE
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x61FE
STRING: About wanting to get married... That isn't a lie, right? If so, then...

LABEL: 0x62B1
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x62C1
STRING: If we will live together, Itarou, then you and I will do... this sort of thing, and that sort of thing...

LABEL: 0x633B
STRING: What are you saying, Clara!? I'm not lying to you!

LABEL: 0x6393
STRING: Of course my feelings for you are real!

LABEL: 0x6424
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x6434
STRING: Wha!!!?

LABEL: 0x6470
STRING: When I grabbed Clara's hand in desperation, she made a strange noise and startled me.

LABEL: 0x6517
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x6527
STRING: What is this... What...!? You surprised me... You're making me so nervous, don't do anythinng out of blue!

LABEL: 0x65FC
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x660C
STRING: A-anyway! I know how you feel, Itarou...

LABEL: 0x66AF
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x66BF
STRING: Oh, that's right! Itarou, would you like to come over to my house sometime? We can get to know each other a little better!

LABEL: 0x678C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x679C
STRING: If you do, I'll treat you to a homemade meal! How about we watch some anime while we eat together?

LABEL: 0x68C1
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: Ah! You look so excited, Itarou! You look so adorable, I love it!

LABEL: 0x699A
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x69AA
STRING: Leave it to me, Itarou! I'm going to put everything into making this delicious meal!

LABEL: 0x6A29
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x6A39
STRING: You can request any meal you like. I'll make you anything you want!

LABEL: 0x6ABC
STRING: I'm getting the VIP treatment too!!!

LABEL: 0x6AF9
STRING: Clara's home cooking...! At her house! And I'm allowed to make a request?

LABEL: 0x6B73
STRING: What, wha, wow! Could I become even happier than this...!?

LABEL: 0x6BFF
STRING: The dinner date with Clara was decided on the spot.

LABEL: 0x6C53
STRING: I am so looking forward to the next time we meet...

LABEL: 0x6DF4
STRING: Haha... Clara was such an angel today.

LABEL: 0x6E42
STRING: Just looking at that lovely figure makes me giddy.

LABEL: 0x6E96
STRING: Oh, what's so cute about her?

LABEL: 0x6ED8
STRING: What a silly question!

LABEL: 0x6F1E
STRING: Everything about her is pretty! There's no reason to not like her!

LABEL: 0x6F7C
STRING: Clara is an angel who has come down to Earth!

LABEL: 0x6FD0
STRING: Her looks, her movements, her voice, her personality, how she speaks... Everything is perfect!

LABEL: 0x703A
STRING: She is the most moe woman I have ever encountered.

LABEL: 0x7086
STRING: She is the ultimate 2.5D woman I've been looking for! She's a 2D person who comes the closest to the 3D realm...

LABEL: 0x70FA
STRING: I am completely convinced that Clara will be named the Goddess of Otakus someday soon.

LABEL: 0x716E
STRING: But I have no intention of handing her over to those filthy other otaku.

LABEL: 0x71C6
STRING: I, and I alone, shall be the one to take Clara's virginity!

LABEL: 0x721E
STRING: No, no. Clara's virginity is too precious to be taken by me.

LABEL: 0x7282
STRING: She is a divine Goddess after all... A pure virgin!

LABEL: 0x72F8
STRING: Oh... Clara!

LABEL: 0x7330
STRING: Today, I reaffirm once again that you are an angel.

LABEL: 0x738C
STRING: I sniff my hand, hoping some of her scent remains, still remembering what happened.

LABEL: 0x7400
STRING: Sniff, sniff, sniff.

LABEL: 0x7468
STRING: Clara, I cannot wait to eat some of your homemade food...

LABEL: 0x74BE
STRING: I cannot wait to visit your house...

LABEL: 0x76EE
STRING: There's a new email from Itarou.

LABEL: 0x7736
STRING: I'm happy... So happy. He says he loves me - he loves me!

LABEL: 0x77A0
STRING: I want you to say more. I want you to love me more and more...

LABEL: 0x7800
STRING: Itarou...

LABEL: 0x782D
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x783D
STRING: Heheh...! I'll see you tomorrow, Itarou...

LABEL: 0x78D1
STRING: What he will see is the other me.

LABEL: 0x7915
STRING: She's me, and yet she is not.

LABEL: 0x794C
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x795C
STRING: So... who am I, then? Which one is the real me?

LABEL: 0x7B58
STRING: Today, I visit Clara's house.

LABEL: 0x7B9E
STRING: She invited me over because she's going to cook for me.

LABEL: 0x7C02
STRING: The sanctuary where Clara lives...! I wonder what kind of place it is?

LABEL: 0x7C62
STRING: I went straight to her house with the cleanest clothes I had.

LABEL: 0x7D0A
STRING: It looks like a perfectly normal apartment building.

LABEL: 0x7D4C
STRING: I thought she lived in a grand mansion due to her gothic lolita dress, but maybe she lives more frugally than I thought.

LABEL: 0x7DDA
STRING: This fact is different from what I expected, though a very welcome one!

LABEL: 0x7E20
STRING: Her email yesterday said she lived alone.

LABEL: 0x7E7A
STRING: So, Clara is the only one in this apartment...

LABEL: 0x7EC8
STRING: It's just the two of us - she and I. I guess this could be called a home date.

LABEL: 0x7F1E
STRING: But if she's living alone, I can come over and visit whenever I want!

LABEL: 0x7F7A
STRING: If I ever get evicted, I can move in with Clara!

LABEL: 0x8026
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x8036
STRING: Itarou! Good morning, I've been waiting for you!

LABEL: 0x80D7
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x80E7
STRING: Come on, come on up! I had to clean in a hurry. Forgive me if it's a bit messy, okay?

LABEL: 0x816E
STRING: Clara greeted me with a smile, wearing her usual black gothic lolita clothes.

LABEL: 0x81DB
STRING: Clara looks like an angel today, as well. Of course she does...

LIST.STRING: You look so beautiful today, Clara...

LABEL: 0x82B9
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x82C9
STRING: Oh, God, you're talking like that again! No, it's so embarrassing! What if someone is watching?

LABEL: 0x8394
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x83A4
STRING: Well... I'll ask you about that later. For now, why don't we head home?

LABEL: 0x841D
STRING: I walk up to the apartment building without another word, accompanied by the shy Clara.

LABEL: 0x84F7
STRING: I enter, and I am completely speechless...

LABEL: 0x853B
STRING: Posters of anime, all over the walls.

LABEL: 0x8583
STRING: Figurines and other otaku goods on the shelves.

LABEL: 0x85D3
STRING: Clara is an otaku just like me.

LABEL: 0x8631
STRING: We played some games together, and talked about our favorite manga and anime...

LABEL: 0x8695
STRING: We had such a great time enjoying our otaku hobbies together.

LABEL: 0x86E9
STRING: With her, I never ran out of things to talk about, and most importantly, we had fun!

LABEL: 0x873F
STRING: This was my first time talking with an otaku girl for real.

LABEL: 0x879D
STRING: Other 3D otaku girls never give me the time of day.

LABEL: 0x880B
STRING: Clara is such an angel... or Goddess.

LABEL: 0x8859
STRING: After spending some quality time together, we had dinner.

LABEL: 0x88B3
STRING: Finally, the time has come... Her cooking!

LABEL: 0x88F9
STRING: Clara worked in the kitchen for a while, and then...

LABEL: 0x894C
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x895C
STRING: Hah, nooooooooooo!!!!

LABEL: 0x89BA
STRING: I could hear screams coming from the kitchen.

LABEL: 0x8A7B
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x8A8B
STRING: Whoa, whoa whoa!!! What do I do!? Fire, go away, go away!!

LABEL: 0x8B01
STRING: I rush over to Clara, who is struggling with the flames on the frying pan.

LABEL: 0x8B6D
STRING: BWAAAAA!!!

LABEL: 0x8BAF
STRING: I poured water on the fire and closed the lid.

LABEL: 0x8C03
STRING: BUSH-BUSH-BUSH... Black smoke rises.

LABEL: 0x8C69
STRING: It looks like the fire has been successfully put out.

LABEL: 0x8D00
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x8D10
STRING: Ah ah ah ah... It finally disappeared...

LABEL: 0x8DCD
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x8DDD
STRING: Ah! Itarou, don't worry! It's nothing! Yup! It's totally fine in here!

LABEL: 0x8EAE
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x8EBE
STRING: Yes! I was flameéing, and it's needed for what I'm cooking! It's so cool, isn't it? Ha ha ha ha...

LABEL: 0x8F5F
STRING: Oh, she was flambeing. I suppose that's alright, then.

LABEL: 0x8FB7
STRING: I think I heard of that before - it's some special cooking method from France.

LABEL: 0x901F
STRING: Clara opened the lid with some uncertainty, and...

LABEL: 0x9079
STRING: The smoke cleared to reveal a horrifying black mess.

LABEL: 0x9108
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x9118
STRING: Whoa! It's all black... What am I going to do... Did I mess up?

LABEL: 0x91CE
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x91DE
STRING: Sorry, Itarou. I think I burned it a little bit. I tried my best...

LABEL: 0x929F
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x92AF
STRING: Ugh, it doesn't look very tasty... I don't think this will taste good...!

LIST.STRING: I can eat anything Clara makes
It's fine, I'll take a bite

LABEL: 0x93D4
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x93E4
STRING: Oh, you're going to eat it...!? Thank you, I'm really sorry. I'll make it better next time...!

LABEL: 0x9466
STRING: I tossed the horrific mess into my mouth.

LABEL: 0x9545
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x9555
STRING: So... what do you think? Is it delicious!?

LABEL: 0x962E
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x963E
STRING: It is!? I'm so glad!! I was worried it would taste bad because it's burnt, but...

LABEL: 0x96AD
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x96BD
STRING: But if Itarou says it's good, then it must be!

LABEL: 0x976E
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x977E
STRING: Haah, I'm so happy that Itarou eats the food I make!!

LABEL: 0x983F
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x984F
STRING: I'll cook for you every day when we live together! Don't worry, it will be great! I'll work so hard to get better!

LABEL: 0x9936
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x9946
STRING: Thanks for your help, Itarou! I love you! I'm looking forward to being with you from now on.

LABEL: 0x99BD
STRING: Even Clara's horrible food tastes good to me.

LABEL: 0x9A1F
STRING: I didn't even need to force myself!

LABEL: 0x9A5F
STRING: Yes! This is what true love is all about!

LABEL: 0x9C2C
STRING: Today was such a memorable day; I visited Clara's home for the first time.

LABEL: 0x9C92
STRING: Her apartment was small, but certainly enough for one person.

LABEL: 0x9CF0
STRING: And the most delightful part was the anime posters all around her apartment.

LABEL: 0x9D58
STRING: Figurines spread throughout the shelves.

LABEL: 0x9D9E
STRING: A closet of eroge, doujinshi, and manga.

LABEL: 0x9DEA
STRING: The shelf by the TV had disks of anime movies.

LABEL: 0x9E2E
STRING: Everyone would agree that she has a great otaku apartment.

LABEL: 0x9E74
STRING: Hmm...aha...!

LABEL: 0x9EAC
STRING: Isn't she truly a goddess descended to the otaku realm...?

LABEL: 0x9F02
STRING: I am truly impressed by Clara's divinity.

LABEL: 0x9F4E
STRING: I was moved to tears on my way home.

LABEL: 0x9FA0
STRING: Her homemade food was not what I'd call delicious.

LABEL: 0x9FF8
STRING: But I didn't want to insult her effort, so I ate it all.

LABEL: 0xA05C
STRING: To be honest, I almost fainted, but I managed to hold on. Truly, this is love.

LABEL: 0xA0C6
STRING: Clara worked so hard to make it for me.

LABEL: 0xA11C
STRING: Just the thought of that... is enough to fill my stomach.

LABEL: 0xA182
STRING: I wish I could go back to visit Clara's apartment again.

LABEL: 0xA38A
STRING: In the darkness, where no sound can be heard, is a woman.

LABEL: 0xA3DA
STRING: She stayed up, as she could not sleep.

LABEL: 0xA42E
STRING: She held a razor blade in her right hand and stared at it with empty eyes...

LABEL: 0xA486
STRING: Then she sits down, and meditates quietly.

LABEL: 0xA4C7
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xA4D7
STRING: I... who am I...? I... am nowhere... This... is weird.

LABEL: 0xA54D
STRING: She makes a cut on her own wrist.

LABEL: 0xA59B
STRING: Blood flows from the wound, flowing down her arm.

LABEL: 0xA5E6
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xA5F6
STRING: Oh... I feel so light... I... do not care anymore... I don't like it... Haha.

LABEL: 0xA6A7
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xA6B7
STRING: Haha...hahahaha...! Itarou...! Itarou...

LABEL: 0xA8BF
STRING: On my days off, I'm always at Clara's apartment.

LABEL: 0xA919
STRING: You could say I'm the prime example of a hopeless man.

LABEL: 0xA96D
STRING: I know it's wrong, but I just want to see her so much I can't stop myself from going.

LABEL: 0xA9D1
STRING: There are days I'm not invited. I suppose I could be seen as a bit of a stalker.

LABEL: 0xAA3D
STRING: But it's fine. Clara is happy to see me whenever I visit.

LABEL: 0xAAA3
STRING: If she says it's okay, then it's okay. Who cares what other people think?

LABEL: 0xAB1D
STRING: I feel myself getting closer and closer to her over time because of it.

LABEL: 0xAB83
STRING: Anyway, it's almost time.

LABEL: 0xABC5
STRING: It's been a month... or maybe two since we first met.

LABEL: 0xAC1B
STRING: I think it's time to progress our relationship.

LABEL: 0xAC75
STRING: I'm thinking of making my move sometime today when we're both in the right mood.

LABEL: 0xACDD
STRING: Eventually, the right opportunity presented itself.

LABEL: 0xAD2F
STRING: We sat side by side on the bed, discussing an anime we watched yesterday.

LABEL: 0xADDB
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xADEB
STRING: I know, right? I totally thought your favorite character would die during that scene!

LABEL: 0xAEBA
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xAECA
STRING: Good for you! I'm sure there will be plenty more goods released in the future! Let's continue to work hard together in our support of our idols!

LABEL: 0xAF9B
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xAFAB
STRING: Huh...!!!? But if you think about it, the death flag isn't gone yet! Uh oh, that's not good at all!

LABEL: 0xB084
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB094
STRING: If this happens, we need to head over and protest! We have to convince the people who made this show to not kill her!

LABEL: 0xB163
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB173
STRING: Then it's decided! Tomorrow, I'll go to Akihabara to get my gear ready! A Happi coat, a blade... and a scaly badge will look cool!

LABEL: 0xB264
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB274
STRING: I'm going to be ready for battle, so be prepared, Itarou! As an otaku, you'd die for your best girl... right!?

LABEL: 0xB316
STRING: Clara seems to be obsessed with whether the character I guessed will die actually dies.

LABEL: 0xB370
STRING: Okay, if I'm going to do this - now!!

LABEL: 0xB3F9
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB409
STRING: Wha! What...? Itarou...?

LABEL: 0xB46B
STRING: She looked like she was struck with a huge blow.

LABEL: 0xB4CD
STRING: I don't know, Clara, but I need to do this...

LABEL: 0xB525
STRING: To be honest, I can't wait to lose my virginity.

LABEL: 0xB5AC
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB5BC
STRING: Ah, you're such a pervert... No no... Itarou, you're such...!

LABEL: 0xB66D
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB67D
STRING: Hyah! Hey!! Hey, wait! Wait up!! STOP!!

LABEL: 0xB700
STRING: When I bring my face close to kiss her, she does her best to stop me.

LABEL: 0xB756
STRING: She holds my face with both hands... I didn't expect this much force!

LABEL: 0xB7A4
STRING: She doesn't want me to!? Oh, you don't need to reject me like that, Clara... Aw, now I feel depressed.

LABEL: 0xB873
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB883
STRING: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to interrupt you. But there's something I really need to tell you...

LABEL: 0xB948
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xB958
STRING: I need to talk to you properly, because if I don't, I'll regret it... so...

LABEL: 0xBA11
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0xBA21
STRING: Please. Can you hold on for one minute?

LABEL: 0xBA9C
STRING: After saying this, she went into the back room.

LABEL: 0xBB28
STRING: Damn. I thought I did everything right...

LABEL: 0xBB6E
STRING: However, I have no choice but to comply with her request.

LABEL: 0xBBC8
STRING: A bit uneasy, I decide to wait a bit.

LABEL: 0xBD31
STRING: What!

LABEL: 0xBDA4
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xBDB4
STRING: Hey, Itarou. Sorry to keep you waiting... You recognize me, right?

LABEL: 0xBE6C
STRING: Moeko...!? What is she doing here?

LABEL: 0xBEC0
STRING: No way...

LABEL: 0xBF37
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xBF47
STRING: Yes, that's right - I'm Moeko. Clara Moemori is Moeko.

LABEL: 0xBFF6
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC006
STRING: ...I'm sorry for not telling you... I didn't want to lie to you... but I couldn't tell you...

LABEL: 0xC07D
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC08D
STRING: You made me really happy... but Itarou likes Clara Moemori, not Moeko, so...

LABEL: 0xC16A
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC17A
STRING: Itarou... do you still like me, now that you know who I am?

LABEL: 0xC239
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC249
STRING: Will you look at me the same way? Even if I'm not Clara, but Moeko, the one you hate?

LIST.STRING: I will never accept you as Moeko

LABEL: 0xC421
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC431
STRING: That's... a lie. A lie, lie, lie, lie!!!

LABEL: 0xC4D4
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC4E4
STRING: You're lying! Itarou would never say such a thing... Why would you lie?

LABEL: 0xC5A3
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC5B3
STRING: Am I right, Itarou? Hahahaha...ahaha. I know I just misheard you right now!

LABEL: 0xC674
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC684
STRING: Because, because... We've been so happy thus far, haven't we? You've been happy!

LABEL: 0xC70D
STRING: Moeko

LIST.STRING: I told you: I won't accept Moeko

STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC820
STRING: What the hell!? We've been together this whole time!

STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xC9AE
STRING: Moeko

STRING: You said you liked me and that you would marry me!!!

LABEL: 0xCAFE
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xCB0E
STRING: You see! I have proof of our love!

LABEL: 0xCBC7
STRING: Moeko

STRING: Huh, haha!! What, don't be silly! This is a diary of our love, just the two of us!

LABEL: 0xCCA8

STRING: We've been in love since the day we met! We've done so many things...

LABEL: 0xCD99
STRING: Moeko

STRING: Hey! Itarou, Itarou!!! Ahiyahahahahahaha!!!!

LABEL: 0xD467
STRING: My days with Itarou are so happy I think I'm going to cry. We're going to marry soon, aren't we? I can't believe it. It's like a dream.

LABEL: 0xD504
STRING: Moeko's Diary

STRING: Everything I thought was fantasy is now reality! Now, we can sleep together every day!

LABEL: 0xD5A3
STRING: Oh God...

LABEL: 0xD5D1
STRING: I think I'm going to be sick!!!

LABEL: 0xD751
STRING: Unable to endure it any longer, I pushed Moeko as hard as I could.

LABEL: 0xD7A7
STRING: What the hell was that!? Is this my fault!?

LABEL: 0xD7EB
STRING: There's no way in hell I'm going to accept some creepy diary written by a lunatic like that!

LABEL: 0xD84F
STRING: 'Moeko and Itarou's Lovey-Dovey 365 Days' - she's completely delusional!

LABEL: 0xD8F5
STRING: Shit! She fell down wrong. She's not moving anymore.

LABEL: 0xD957
STRING: Whoa, no way.

LABEL: 0xD98D
STRING: Dead? Did I kill her...?

LABEL: 0xD9D1
STRING: I got scared and sprinted out of the apartment.

LABEL: 0xDA6F
STRING: Ha, huff, ha, huff.

LABEL: 0xDAB7
STRING: Out of breath, I managed to get back into my room.

LABEL: 0xDAF9
STRING: No one saw me go out of Moeko's house... right?

LABEL: 0xDB57
STRING: But... she's dead, right? Stone cold dead.

LABEL: 0xDBA5
STRING: Wait a minute. It was an accident.

LABEL: 0xDBF9
STRING: I didn't mean to... I didn't mean to go that far!

LABEL: 0xDC57
STRING: It was an accident! It's not my fault!

LABEL: 0xDC9D
STRING: It's all Moeko's fault! Damn bitch lied on me.

LABEL: 0xDD03
STRING: Oh... I'm so pissed off!

LABEL: 0xDD4B
STRING: I'll just go to bed and forget about her.

LABEL: 0xDD9F
STRING: That's right! Clara Moemori? Who's that?

LABEL: 0xDE03
STRING: I never met any Moemori person. I wasn't interested.

LABEL: 0xDE71
STRING: I don't know. I don't know. I don't! She's a total stranger! She's got nothing to do with me!

LABEL: 0xDEE3
STRING: I'll just sleep and try to forget this ever happened!

LABEL: 0xE028
STRING: Hey, did you hear?

LABEL: 0xE06D
STRING: About Itarou and Moeko?

LABEL: 0xE0BE
STRING: Oh. What? They are dead?

LABEL: 0xE111
STRING: Looks that way. It's scary to think we worked in the same office...

LABEL: 0xE174

STRING: Yeah, they committed suicide together apparently...

LABEL: 0xE23C

STRING: Moeko

STRING: Moeko

STRING: If you don't mind, would you accept whatever I tell you as true?

STRING: Moeko
